parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Destroys camera object created with [[camCreate]]. This command doesn't need [[camCommit]]. 
<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Destroying camera object does not terminate camera effect automatically, use [[cameraEffect]] prior to deleting the camera (see Example 2)</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[camDestroy]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[camDestroy]] _cam;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["terminate","back"];
[[camDestroy]] _cam;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camCreate]], [[cameraEffect]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|CAMDESTROY]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|CAMDESTROY]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.46|CAMDESTROY]]
